name: Total GHG emissions (Scope 1+2)
green_rule: YoY change ≤ -5% OR on approved decarbonization trajectory
notes: No universal “good” level; depends on scale, boundaries, grid factors, product mix. Always disclose Scope, boundary, factors.

name: Specific GHG emissions per functional unit
green_rule: ≤ peer P25 for intensity OR improvement ≥3–5% vs baseline
amber_rule: Between peer P25–P75 OR ±0–3% vs baseline
red_rule: ≥ peer P75 OR worsening vs baseline
notes: Ensure FU definition is stable; normalize by output and control for mix where possible.

name: Energy intensity
notes: Use ISO 50001-style EnPI baseline comparison; normalize for drivers (volume, weather, mix).

name: Share of renewable energy
notes: Adjust if local renewable access is constrained; track credible certificates/PPAs.

name: Waste generation and recovery rate
green_rule: Recovery rate ≥80% (excellent ≥90%); and waste mass trending down vs baseline
notes: Composite KPI (t and %). Recommended: store separately as Waste_generated_t and Waste_recovery_% for clearer benchmarking.

name: Water consumption intensity
green_rule: Improvement ≥3% vs baseline and low variance (no leak spikes)
notes: Highly context dependent (water stress, permits, recycling loops). Consider location-based weighting.

name: Circularity ratio (%)
notes: Depends on availability of recycled inputs/returns and product design; define circularity method consistently.

name: Total cost per functional unit
red_rule: ≥ baseline +2% OR cost down with service degradation
notes: Pair with service KPIs (OTIF, quality) to avoid “cost-only” optimization.

name: Fuel and energy cost share in operating cost
notes: Depends on energy intensity, tariffs, fuel mix; best used as “risk exposure” + trend.

name: Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE)
notes: Use consistent OEE model (availability, performance, quality). Don’t chase OEE if it drives overproduction/hidden costs.

name: Return on sustainability-related investments
notes: Define ROSI consistently (NPV/IRR/payback) aligned with finance policy.

name: Maintenance cost per operating hour
red_rule: ≥ baseline +2% OR cost down with reliability decline
notes: €/h is not comparable across plants. Recommended: add MC/RAV% for benchmarking (annual maintenance cost / replacement asset value).

name: Logistics cost per tonne-kilometre (or unit-kilometre)
green_rule: ≤ peer P25 OR improvement ≥2–5% vs baseline
notes: Depends on mode, distance, backhaul, fuel price. Track by lane/mode and normalize.

name: Lost Time Injury Frequency Rate (LTIFR)
notes: LTIs per 1,000,000 hours. Benchmark vs industry datasets when available.

name: Training hours per employee per year
notes: Training needs vary by job family; also track % employees trained and critical skills coverage.

name: Worker participation / improvement suggestions
notes: Depends on program maturity; pair with implementation rate/impact.

name: Community incidents and substantiated complaints
notes: Define “substantiated” consistently; normalize by output/revenue for cross-site comparison.

name: Employees covered by regular health checks
notes: Define eligible population clearly; privacy-compliant reporting.

name: Customer acceptance index for sustainable/low-carbon products
notes: Index varies (survey, market share, tests). Keep methodology fixed across time.

name: Digitalization rate of core processes
notes: Define “digitalized” rigorously (data captured + workflow digitized + usable for decisions).

name: Assets connected to IoT / monitoring
notes: Weight by asset criticality (connect critical assets first).

name: Coverage of MRV measurement points
notes: Coverage reflects MRV capability; ensure calibration and mapping to emission sources.

name: Share of product volume with Digital Product Passport (DPP/ADP)
notes: Often driven by regulation/customer demand; define minimum DPP dataset + verification.

name: Data quality index (completeness, consistency, accuracy)
notes: Compute from completeness + consistency + accuracy rules; audit regularly.

name: Integration level of OT and IT systems
Decisions supported by analytics/models
notes: Define what counts as “analytics-supported decision” (dashboard, optimization, simulation, MCDA).
